markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Ape](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=363)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 23 <sup>1.1</sup>

While many apes exhibit peaceful or reclusive behavior, gorillas can be territorial, and the megaprimatus is especially aggressive and dangerous.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Gorilla](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2827) (Creature 3), [Megaprimatus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2828) (Creature 8)
name: Ape
